record.description: [Photographic copy of a] proposed site plan for the University of Chicago's New Medical School on the Midway and how the units will look when completed.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Attached to cardboard back. Surface has white streaks or scratches that appear on the scan. One copy has stamp: Please return to University of Chicago Public Relations Office. Copy has University of Chicago Archives stamp.
